back

Time Filter

This filter will take a unix timestamp and extract only the time component and display it as a time as either am/pm or 24 hour time in the local timezone.

  • Time 86399: {{ 86399 | time }}
  • Time abc: {{ 'abc' | time }}

AngularJS Directives

Time:


There is also a directive for making a non-input element editable:

{{ time2 | time }}
{{ time2 | time:'24' }}


The non-input directive will broadcast a message when the edit starts and when it finishes so that your controllers and models can handle the edit properly.

Last Message : {{ lastMessage }}
